trustfund:
TF023823-GEF2 PDF BLOCK B -
            ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AND SUSTAINABLE INTEGRATED

abstracts.cdata!:
The long-term objective of the process
            started through the Environmental Protection and Sustainable
            Development of the Guarani Aquifer System Project is the
            sustainable management and use of the Guarani Aquifer
            System. This System is situated in the eastern and south
            central areas of South America, and underlies parts of
            Argentina, Brazil, Paraguay, and Uruguay. This project is a
            first step toward achieving the long-term objective. The
            project aims to support the four countries mentioned in
            jointly elaborating and implementing a common institutional,
            legal, and technical framework for managing and preserving
            the Guarani Aquifer System for current and future
            generations. To achieve this, seven project components are
            envisaged: 1) expanding and consolidating the current
            scientific and technical knowledge base regarding the
            System; 2) jointly developing and implementing a Guarani
            Aquifer System Management Framework, based upoon an agreed
            Strategic Program of Action; 3) enhancing public and
            stakeholder participation, social communication, and
            environmental education; 4) evaluating and monitoring the
            project and disseminating project results; 5) developing
            regionally-appropriate groundwater management and mitigation
            measures in "hot spots"; 6) considering the
            potential to utilize the System's "clean"
            geothermal energy; and 7) coordinating and managing the project.
